column2: "Welcome back! I've been waiting! Did you come up with any ideas for games?"
"Mhm... Playing for prizes, you say. Maybe grabbing prizes with a crane, or throwing hoops around them."
"And we could have a bouncing bunny car for people to ride around in and soothe their aching legs!"
"I can just picture this exciting Game Corner now! Thank you so much! I'll do my best to get it set up in time!"
